                                             @DelegatesTo(value=TestDefinitionBuilder.class,strategy=1)
                                             groovy.lang.Closure<TestDefinitionBuilder> configuration)
        Prepare every test with following configuration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - configuration applied to every feature method
        Returns:
        self

      • test

        public static Gru test(Gru self,
                       @DelegatesTo(value=TestDefinitionBuilder.class,strategy=1)
                       groovy.lang.Closure<TestDefinitionBuilder> expectation)
        Defines API test and runs the controller initialization and the action under test.

        Use this method either in when or expect block.

        Parameters:
        expectation - test definition
        Returns:
        self, note that when Groovy Truth is evaluated, verify method is called automatically

      • verify

        Throwable

      • asBoolean

        public static boolean asBoolean(Gru self)
                         throws Throwable
        Allows to create feature method with only "expect" block by calling the verify method when this definition is automagically converted to boolean.
        Returns:
        true if all verifications are successful
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if any verification fails
        Throwable

      • command

        public static <M extends Minion> void command(Squad self,
                                              Class<M> minionType,
                                              @DelegatesTo(type="M",strategy=1)
                                              groovy.lang.Closure<?> aCommand)
        Command minion of given type. If the minion is not yet present in the squad it is instantiated using default constructor.
        Parameters:
        minionType - type of the minion being commanded
        aCommand - closure executed within context of selected minion

      • ask

        public static <T,M extends Minion> T ask(Squad self,
                                         Class<M> minionType,
                                         @DelegatesTo(type="M",strategy=1)
                                         groovy.lang.Closure<T> query)
        Asks minion of given type for something.
        Parameters:
        minionType - type of the minion being asked
        query - closure executed within context of selected minion which returns the result of this method
        Returns:
        result returned from the query closure or null if minion of given type is not present in the squad
